title: Fantastic Children
synopsis: A group of enigmatic white-haired children has been spotted at different times and places in Europe for over 500 years. Always with the appearance of 11-year-olds, they behave far more mature than they should be, never grow old, and seem to have supernatural power. What they have been seeking is a girl, and the only clue they have is a picture with a crescent moon. Now, in the year of 2012, an athletic boy named Tohma is about to be involved in this centuries-long mystery.
related_anime: ['Fantastic Children: Befort no Kodomo-tachi no Sonogo', 'Fantastic Children: Tokei Jikake no Tabibito-tachi']
voices: ['Minagawa, Junko', 'Urata, Yuu', 'Takaguchi, Yukiko', 'Gotou, Satoshi', 'Matsumoto, Sachi', 'Sakamoto, Maaya', 'Hanawa, Eiji', 'Kawaragi, Shiho', 'Kobayashi, Kei', 'Yaguchi, Asami']
